ACMECheckKind = enum

ACMECheckResponse = object
  case kind: ACMECheckKind
  of ACMEOrderCheck:
      orderStatus: ACMEOrderStatus

  of ACMEChallengeCheck:
      chalStatus: ACMEChallengeStatus

  retryAfter: Duration
